Title: Permits the village of Croton-on-Hudson, Westchester county, to lease certain sports field fences for advertisements
Summary: Permits the village of Croton-on-Hudson, Westchester county, to lease certain sports field fences for advertisements, with revenues to be used solely for the care of Dobbs Park, Duck Pond Park, Firefighters Memorial Field and David J. Manes Memorial Field.
LawCode: Add ยง77-k, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to permitting the village of Croton-on-Hudson, Westchester county, to lease certain sports field fences for advertisements
